Our first Drink and Draw event was a success! We are going to continue this once a month. Additionally, there was some interest in a [Nature Journaling Club](https://www.shastasketchers.com/nature) Meet-up. To find out more about upcoming events please visit our website at [Shasta Sketchers](https://www.shastasketchers.com/).

I made this simple flier for promoting the event:
![](/images/ShastaSketchers-NatureJournaling.png)

If you like my sketches you can check out the [sketchbook section](https://www.codymarkelz.art/sketchbook) of my art [portfolio website](https://www.codymarkelz.art/) or follow me on instagram [codymarkelz](https://www.instagram.com/codymarkelz/).
